channel.title: Gianne Chiong on Rakuten Engineering Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gianne Chiong on Rakuten Engineering Blog

item.title: RDS: Automating Code and Asset Generation From Figma
item.description: Hi, this is Gian from the E-Commerce Mobile Architect Group. The mission of our group is to improve productivity by creating tools to automate tasks and providing technical support for the e-commerce mobile app development teams. In this article, we will discuss one of the developer tools we created to automate designer-to-developer handoff. Overview Designer-to-developer handoff is an important part of the product development life cycle. It takes place when the design deliverables are ready to be provided to developers for implementation.
